title: Return of the Disappeared
outcome: Disappearances once blamed on BCI errors are reversed when lost citizens reemerge, bringing secrets and personal stories that publicly challenge Council legitimacy. Mass rallies demand accountability as political power fractures.

events.description: Vanished citizens abruptly return, sharing testimonies of BCI manipulation and secret purges at neighborhood assemblies, shocking the public and inspiring mass gatherings.
Major citizen rallies form in city squares, led by re-emerged ghost users and their supporters, demanding independent investigation into Council actions and reparations for the disappeared.
Council factions hold emergency talks as more testimonies surface; Directorate calls for information control, while Harmonists seek to placate crowds with promises of transparency.
Popular anger rises as formerly compliant citizens publicly resign from Council-appointed jobs, citing complicity in disappearances. Calls for mass resignations spread through social channels.
Under mounting pressure, the Council is forced to agree to an external review. Power shifts as investigative panels, led by those who returned, begin to uncover historical BCI abuses.
